info.name: Zelda B-button - Tumblr New Post Icons
info.description: Dashboard new post icons for tumblr inspired in the Zelda series.
info.additionalInfo: This are some icons I made for a launcher theme for android, I've decided re-using them for tumblr and share them with you :P  Any questions or request go here: http://eledeloquesea.tumblr.com/
